title: Mozilla browser not working anymore for my online banking
content: Not exactly sure why but the browser is no longer working for my banking. I first noticed it a week ago when I tried to log in and then ended up calling the bank tech support. They told me to use google chrome instead. I have been using Firefox for years and never had a problem. After researching for latest update changes, I tried changing the settings to allow cookies for the session for the bank but this did not work either. Any idea why this is happening? Thank you. Tony.
creator: tony.koukounas

title: Issue with trying to Access Ticketmaster.Com.  Is it their site or my settings?
content: I have attached a screen shot of what I am getting when I try to access TicketMaster.Com. What have or am I doing wrong? Where or How Can I Fix This?
creator: dhjohnson1961

title: Firefox passwords missing (profile intact, weird startup page)
content:
After restarting my computer all of my passwords have disappeared. I still have all my bookmarks, history and download history, extensions (though they are not visible on the upper tab like usual) even some user prompts. The start up page is two tabs "Open up an amazing internet Our latest version is built around you,.." says on, while the second is " Firefox Privacy Notice Effective August 1, 2022 ". These two tabs keep opening on startup even though Ive restarted dozens of times and chose specific statup pages in settings.

What happened to my passwords and what ways can I attempt to recover them. Was I synced with a Firefox account and theyre missing because I logged out (why are bookmarks still visible then)? (I tried typing in various email addresses I own into Sync but it gave me a signup prompt so I assume that means there is no account attached to these emails?).
creator: ivad918

title: Firefox keeps making new book marks called "new tab", how can i stop this?
content: i clear this every once in a while but i always have multiple "new tab" bookmarks. Am i possibly pressing some keyboard shortcut which causes this?
creator: arav.bende

title: How to change New Private Window keyboard shortcut?
content:
I am new to Firefox, and have just discovered that in order to open a new private window I must use the Ctrl + Shift + P keyboard shortcut which is pretty much impossible to accomplish with one hand. I tried to use this extension:

https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/shortkeys/

But sadly my new added shortcuts were not opening the new private window while the ctrl + shift + p still worked, and it appears that this extension is only able to add new shortcuts and not change nor delete the existing ones. I want to assign a comfortable keyboard shortcut for opening a we private window (optionally unassign the Ctrl + Shift + N from Undo close window and assign that keyboard to open a new private window).
creator: Shmark
